pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a library for GNU Guile to create language bindings via GObject Introspection. Guile GI has two primary components: - The gi scheme modules: guile modules that provide functionality to dynamically generate Scheme API from GObject typelib files. - libguile-gi.so or libguile-gi.dll: a compiled module that contains glue code to interface with GObject. To create bindings, use the use-typelibs syntax found in the (gi) library.
